ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 17 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens  + Canon Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III Autofocus Lens + High-Power Zoom Flash

Spare LP-E12 Battery + Spare Battery Charger + Camera and Lens Bag + 2x Vivitar 58mm UV Filters + Screen Protector
45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) + 2.5x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit --- Exclusive by TheImagingWorld
